name: Malty Melromarc (The Rising of the Shield Hero)
description:
It is a character LoRA of Malty Melromarc from The Rising of the Shield Hero. V1.0 was trained on AbyssOrangeMix2_hard model. V1.1 was trained on NovelAI.

For better appearance add "red jewelry, green eyes, red hair, steel armor, belt, cleavage, bare shoulders, purple skirt"

modelVersions.name: v1.1
modelVersions.description: Retrained the model with larger dataset on NovelAI model following this guide: https://civitai.com/models/22530/guide-make-your-own-loras-easy-and-free

meta.prompt: malty melromarc, upper body, 1girl, red jewelry, green eyes, red hair, steel armor, belt, cleavage, bare shoulders, purple skirt, looking at viewer, <lora:Malty Melromarc v1_1:0.8>
